title: Dream house
creator_credit: Tasmanian Film Corporation and John Honey
brief_description: Puppets go through the steps of building the Australian “dream house” with disastrous results. The second part of the film examines the many legal pitfalls, and suggestions are made for the wise consumer to follow.
description: Puppets go through the steps of building the Australian “dream house” with disastrous results. The second part of the film examines the many legal pitfalls, and suggestions are made for the wise consumer to follow.
